A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just can't figure out what people see in this. As a stand alone movie it would be fine. 3\, maybe 4 out of 5. But as an eighth installment to a saga\, this falls flat. REALLY flat. At this point what is the purpose of episodes 1-6? Uncreative art design\, the plot goes nowhere\, and an ending that feels like the ending of a saga rather than a third act. How the hell are the \"good guys\" supposed to win outside of a lazy deus ex machina? Very disappointed.
